justification: “Eye-trackers (Pupil Core eye trackers from Pupil Labs) were attached to the participants… Using the recording software … the eye tracker outputs the gaze … fixation data.”

measured_by: microswitch touch sensors embedded in gloves
justification: “Gloves contained a microswitch under the index finger to accurately record touching events… allowing accurate phasing of the cooperative manipulation based on the moments of touching and untouching.”
construct: hand–object touch events / phasing of manipulation actions

measured_by: five-view FLIR camera array with YOLOv5 detection and Unscented Kalman Filter tracking
justification: “Using the recorded camera images of all five cameras, a custom trained … YOLOv5 model detects the hands … Subsequently, a triangulation algorithm transforms these … and the 3D AABBs are tracked using a modified Unscented Kalman Filter.”
